name: home-inventory
description: A full stack application to help manage and view a home inventory.

scripts.install: (cd front-end && npm install) && (cd back-end && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd front-end && npm run start" "cd back-end && npm run start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd front-end && npm run build" "cd back-end && npm run build"

author: Corwin Dickey
